EmailTemplate.description: We Found You a Great Financing Solution
EmailTemplate.name: Rocket Loans Referral
EmailTemplate.subject: The Rocket Loans Solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. Based on what we talked about earlier, it looks like RocketLoans is the best solution for you right now.
With RocketLoans, you can get up to $35,000 deposited into your account within 24 hours. Click below to check your rates without affecting your credit score!
Check My Rates ra.rocketloans.com
​​​​​​Create your account today and you could get your funds as soon as tomorrow.
I want to wish you good luck and hope we will be able to do business with you in the future!
Best,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
20 West Jefferson | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
